text:
lOqkaH sara#svatyA yAntyEqSha vai dE#vaqyAnaqH panthAqsta-mEqvA-nvArO#hantyAqkrOSa#ntO yAqntyava#rti-mEqvAnyasmi#n pratiqShajya# pratiqShThAM ga#cCanti yaqdA daSa# SaqtaM kuqrvantyathaika#-muqtthAna(gm)# SaqtAyuqH puru#ShaH 
SaqtEndri#yaq Ayu#ShyEqvEndriqyE prati# tiShThanti yaqdA Saqta(gm) saqhasra#M kuqrvantyathaika#-muqtthAna(gm)# saqhasra#saMmitOq vA aqsau lOqkO#&mumEqva lOqkamaqBi ja#yanti yaqdai ( ) -ShA$M praqmIyE#ta yaqdA vAq jIyE#raqnnathaika#-muqtthAnaqM taddhi tIqrthaM || 4 
(pRuqShThAni#-saptadaqSaH-su#vaqrgO-ja#yanti yaqdai - kA#daSa ca) (A1)
